name: Operation: Kill the Plushy!
description:
Arcade Survival Shooter is a game based off of and adapted from the original game made by Unity (https://www.assetstore.unity3d.com/en/#!/content/40756) as part of an assignment for university. Shoot the enemies to accumulate a score higher than 300 points and collect the key to move on to the next level and then eventually face the boss!!

Game Trailer: https://youtu.be/T4qUGk8gb0k

Background Music: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1zsiEaBKmE4
